issue.title: C++: Add logical "Column" container for chunked data
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-23](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-23). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In some in-memory applications, logical columns will contain a list of primitive (contiguous) Arrow arrays. In particular, this strategy would be applied to represent very large in-memory tables (e.g. exceeding INT32_MAX rows)
